hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.bulkentry.business.BulkEntryAccountFeeActionView( feeAction.accountActionDate.actionDateId, feeAction.fee, feeAction.feeAmount, feeAction.feeAmountPaid ) from org.mifos.application.accounts.business.AccountActionDateEntity as accountAction, org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer, org.mifos.application.accounts.business.AccountFeesActionDetailEntity as feeAction where customer.customerId = accountAction.customer.customerId and accountAction.actionDate <=:MEETING_DATE and accountAction.paymentStatus=:PAYMENT_STATUS and customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerStatus.statusId in (3,4,9,10,13) and accountAction.actionDateId = feeAction.accountActionDate.actionDateId order by customer.customerId, accountAction.account.accountId,accountAction.actionDate,feeAction.accountActionDate.actionDateId
